Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory217.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: "Ugh... I can't hear the mother-frame anymore... What are you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "He's not asking for your name...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Having dealt with the Corrupted, most of the bionics sink to the floor out of relief. Some, however, decide to ask of Nanami's affiliations."}
{3: '...To which, they are met with little success.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Some of the bionics just off and ran when the Corrupties appeared, but I think we saved most of who we can save, yeah?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "LOOK AT WHAT YOU'VE DONE!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Nanami could even respond, several more bionics join. They glare at Nanami with murderous wrath.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "What are we going to do without the voice of our mother-frame?! We won't know where our main forces are attacking!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "Wait... You're still trying to fight?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "Of course we are! You aren't siding with that Construct, are you?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "I'm not siding with her. But no good will come out of fighting for both sides.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: '"Good"... Pah. You call yourself a bionic? You\'d let these humans off, even when they made us into weapons and sealed us underground?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "We woke up to find ourselves stabbed by our own creators—then next thing we know—we're all forced underground via our in-built commands.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'We will never forgive these humans who treated us so!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "Um... I... think this info's not even in my lost data files. What was all that about?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "Hmph. I see. You're one of the newer batches, huh?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh. Y'all come from different production batches?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'Of course. Without a production line, how else could we keep up with the humans? Your platoon must have been filled with these rookies. Pah.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "But whether you're an old-bear or a new-bear, you were all controlled by the mother-frame until now, right?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "You don't understand. The mother-frame shares the same goal as ours. We can feel what our mother-frame feels through our receivers, but we are willingly fighting for her ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Willingly, huh...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'That Martin must have lost his related data files, but everyone else here should know about what happened to Amberia, our mother-frame.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The older bear model scans around before resting his sights on Nanami.'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'Our mother-frame, Amberia is also a Construct like you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Amberia is a Construct?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'When the Punishing Virus broke out, ARU had some dying or terminally ill people sent into their labs for "research."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "They paint it as an effort to fight against the virus on the surface, but secretly, they're building their own weapons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'After endless sacrifices, the ARU created what came to be known as humanoid-hybrid Constructs. The very first prototype was our mother-frame, Amberia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Huh, so... Amberia was a weaponized Construct?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'Indeed. With the body of a mutant, every movement of her brought about destruction. But that is not her most terrifying realization when she woke up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "She isn't the master of her own body. The higher-ups in the ARU are.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'Do you think a little girl could just accept this and live with it?! Her unending anger coursed through her frenzied M.I.N.D.; it shot through the receivers and flowed into our processors.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'We have never, and will never forget that despair she felt... Which is why...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The bear model surveys the other bionics.'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: 'Which is why we still fight even without our receivers! If you still wish to avenge Amberia, then come with me!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Under the roars of the bear models, some bionics stand and follow his exit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wait! Some weird Corrupted are still rolling about in the snow up ahead! Just like the ones just now, trying to corrupt you!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "It doesn't matter if we get corrupted or not! As long as we can wake Amberia and free her, we'll go through anything!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "We're just... trying to free Amberia from her nightmare.", 4: '1'}
